00010 #include "dict_lib.h"
00011 
00012 DICT_LINK *dict_init(void){
00013         DICT_LINK *dl;
00014         dl = (DICT_LINK *)calloc(1, sizeof(DICT_LINK));
00015         dl->da = NULL;
00016         return dl;
00017 }
00018 
00019 DICT_ARRAY *dict_add(FieldName const *fields, char **value, unsigned int num_field){
00020         DICT_ARRAY *array_run, *array_head;
00021         FieldName const *fn_run;
00022         int m = num_field-1;
00023 
00024         fn_run = fields;
00025         array_head = NULL;
00026 
00027         while(fn_run != NULL && fn_run->fn != NULL){
00028                 array_run = (DICT_ARRAY *)calloc(1, sizeof(DICT_ARRAY));
00029                 array_run->value = value[m]!=NULL ? strdup(value[m]) : value[m];
00030                 array_run->field = fn_run->fn ? strdup(fn_run->fn) : fn_run->fn;
00031         array_run->next = array_head; 
00032                 array_head = array_run;
00033                 fn_run = fn_run->next;
00034                 m--;
00035         }
00036         
00037         return array_head;
00038 }
00039 
00040 int dict_length(DICT_LINK *head){
00041     DICT_LINK *l;
00042     int i=0;
00043     l = head;
00044     for(;l;l=l->next)i++;
00045 
00046     return i;
00047 }
00048 
00049 DICT_LINK *dict_find_link_base(DICT_LINK *head, DICT_ARRAY *da_head, int except){
00050     DICT_LINK *l, *h_pre;
00051     DICT_ARRAY *da;
00052     l = h_pre = head;
00053 
00054     for(;l;l=l->next){
00055         da = l->da;
00056         for(;da;da=da->next)
00057             if(strcmp(da->field, da_head->field)==0 && strcmp(da->value, da_head->value)==0){
00058                 if(except == 1){
00059                     h_pre->next = l->next;
00060                     l->next = NULL;
00061                 }
00062                 return l;
00063             }
00064         h_pre = l;
00065     }
00066 
00067     return l;
00068 }
00069 
00070 DICT_ARRAY *dict_find_array(DICT_ARRAY *head, char *find_field){
00071     DICT_ARRAY *d;
00072     d = head;
00073     
00074     for(;d;d=d->next){
00075         if(strcmp(d->field, find_field) == 0)return d;
00076     }
00077 
00078     return d;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 DICT_LINK *dict_except_link(DICT_LINK *head, DICT_ARRAY *except){
00083     return dict_find_link_base(head, except, 1);
00084 }
00085 
00086 DICT_LINK *dict_find_link(DICT_LINK *head, DICT_ARRAY *da_head){
00087     return dict_find_link_base(head, da_head, 0);
00088 }

00091 FieldName *field_init(void){
00092         FieldName *fn_head;
00093         fn_head = (FieldName *)calloc(1, sizeof(FieldName));
00094         fn_head->fn = NULL;
00095         return fn_head;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void field_add(FieldName **head, char *fn, int type){
00099         FieldName *nfn;
00100         nfn = field_init();
00101         
00102         if(fn != NULL){
00103                 if(type == 0)
00104                         nfn->fn = strdup(fn);
00105                 else
00106                         nfn->fn = strdup("_0");
00107         }
00108         nfn->next = *head;
00109         *head = nfn;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void dict_free(DICT_LINK *head){
00113         DICT_LINK *link_del, *link_run;
00114         DICT_ARRAY *array_del, *array_run;
00115 
00116         link_run = head;
00117         while(link_run != NULL){
00118                 link_del = link_run;
00119                 array_run = link_del->da;
00120                 link_run = link_run->next;
00121 
00122                 while(array_run != NULL){
00123                         array_del = array_run;
00124                         array_run = array_run->next;
00125                         free(array_del->field);
00126                         free(array_del->value);
00127                         free(array_del);
00128                 }
00129                 free(link_del);
00130         }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void field_free(FieldName *head){
00134         FieldName *fn_del, *fn_run;
00135         
00136         fn_run = head;
00137 
00138         while(fn_run != NULL){
00139                 fn_del = fn_run;
00140                 fn_run = fn_run->next;
00141                 free(fn_del->fn);
00142                 free(fn_del);
00143         }
00144 }
